pages.text: This multiblock, being one of a few variations on the Terrestrial Agglomeration Plate, allows the player to create both Constellation Papers and a somewhat weak Floating Crystal.
Turn the page for recipes and the respective outputs.

pages.title: Floating Crystal
pages.text: Costs: $(br)$(li)$(item)64 Illumination Powder$(li)$(item)8 Quartz Blocks$(li)$(item)5 Marble Blocks$(li)$(item)5 Aquamarines$(li)$(item)4 Piles of Ember Grit$(li)$(item)2 Moonstones$()$(br2)Mana: half a pool

pages.title: Constellation Papers
pages.text: Costs: $(br)$(li)$(item)Nitor$(li)$(item)Celestial Notes (Stars)$(li)$(item)Mystical Feather$(li)$(item)A Pile of Ash$()$(br2)Mana: 1/100th of a pool

pages.title: Crystal Stats
pages.text: The stats of the resulting crystal are as follows: $(br)$(li)$(#ffd700)Size: 100$(li)Cutting: 25%$(li)Purity: 25%$()$(br2)Making your own Floating Crystal with better stats is highly recommended due to the middling stats of this one.
